post.author: Francis of Assisi
post.content: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.

post.author: Steve Jobs
post.content: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

post.author: Kevyn Aucoin
post.content: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.

post.author: Jim Rohn
post.content: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.

post.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
post.content: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

post.author: Maya Angelou
post.content: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.

post.author: Jimmy Dean
post.content: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.

post.author: Og Mandino
post.content: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
